Chapter 4316 - Chapter 4316: 4315 Core, Under The Primal Chaos Stone

Chapter 4316: 4315 core, under the primal Chaos Stone

Translator: 549690339

Wang Xian didn’t know when the spirit kneader and the rest would leave.

Therefore, he had been waiting in the region of the cross primordial spirit.

He would use the divination lamp to perform divination from time to time to see if he would be attacked again!

When he continued his fifth divination, he got a good result.

“Looks like they have left!”

Wang Xian revealed a smile and heaved a sigh of relief.

His body moved and he flew towards the location outside.

Wang Xian did not go to the core of the cross primordial spirit to look for the treasure immediately.

In order to avoid any accidents, Wang Xian had to make a trip back first.

He asked an lie to bring the treasures and resources he had to the Dragon Palace.

He had too many resources and treasures in his hands now.

He had obtained more than 30 god of elements fragments in the cross primordial spirit region.

Including the god of elements fragments obtained from the spirit kneader and the others, he had more than 40 of them in his hands.

In addition, he had to place the Tai Chi Dragon disc in the Dragon Palace.

This was because if he wanted to enter the core region, he couldn’t have any impurities on his body.

Otherwise, he would be attacked!

After flying out of the cross-shaped primordial spirit area, Wang Xian flew straight out.

Although his strength was weaker now, it was not something that an ordinary great dao could contend against.

Wang Xian flew out of the chaotic area.

Without the interference of this energy, Wang Xian could vaguely contact the dragon palace through the ancestral tree.

Then, he summoned an lie over.

“Dragon King!”

Not long after, an lie came up to him and bowed respectfully.

“Yes, an lie. Tell me to bring all these treasures to the Dragon Palace. I don’t have time to go back for now. As for the treasures, I’ll deal with them when I get back.”

Wang Xian instructed an lie.

“It’s the Dragon King!”

An lie nodded immediately and replied.

After Wang Xian gave all the treasures and resources to an lie, he stepped into the area of the cross primordial spirit once again.

Without all the treasures and resources, Wang Xian was much weaker now.

Fortunately, there was no problem for him to enter the area of the cross primordial spirit.

When he came to the area of the cross primordial spirit again, Wang Xian stared at it with anticipation in his eyes.

He had paid a huge price to enter the cross-shaped primordial spirit region this time.

Although it was also because of the spirit kneader.

However, after entering the core region, if Wang Xian wanted to recover to his previous state, he would have to commit suicide and resurrect himself.

This was because his current body was already fixed by himself. He could not cultivate nor could he recover to his previous state.

He had to commit suicide and resurrect himself!

With this thought in mind, Wang Xian entered the area and swam towards that area.

His speed was very fast. It was far from what the body of a ten-elemental divine dragon could compare to.

“The last time, I used the body of a ten-elemental divine dragon to search for treasures here. There were many treasures that I could not get my hands on in the area where the energy was unstable. This time, with my body, I should be able to get my hands on them.”

“Also, according to Song Ta and the rest, there are supreme treasures of the Heaven’s origin. I didn’t manage to find them last time. Should I look for them this time?”

Wang Xian thought to himself. A thoughtful look appeared on his face.

This cross-shaped primordial spirit area was a huge treasure trove.

If he could get his hands on all the treasures here, the resources would definitely be insane.

After hesitating for a moment, Wang Xian put down the treasures temporarily. The most important thing now was to get his hands on the sphere at the core.

After confirming the location in front of him, Wang Xian flew over quickly.

It took him a long time to reach the place last time. This time, Wang Xian only used one day.

This was because there were no impurities on Wang Xian’s body. He wouldn’t be attacked by the surrounding energy at all.

Hovering beside an elemental god, Wang Xian looked at the chaotic region in front of him.

Since Wang Xian came here in his true form, his perception of the surroundings was wider.

He could see that the ten elemental gods were in a circular shape around him.

The elemental gods were releasing powerful elemental energy as they surged forward.

One elemental god was like the source of a long river, flowing forward.

The place where the ten elemental gods’energy rivers intersected formed a chaotic region.

Wang Xian moved his body and continued swimming forward.

Soon, Wang Xian entered the place where the energy rivers intersected.

Upon entering, Wang Xian had the exact same feeling as if he was staying in a chaotic space.

“What’s going on? Why is the place where the ten elemental gods’energy intersected a dead silence of Chaos? Is it because the power of Chaos is formed from the combination of ten elemental energies?”

“Or could it be that this chaotic region is caused by other reasons? The sphere in the core region?”

Wang Xian kept guessing in his heart.

He looked at his surroundings and continued flying in.

Half a day later, Wang Xian bumped into the sphere that he bumped into the last time.

Looking at the sphere that was emitting a strange energy, his eyes sparkled.

The ball, which was a fusion of life force and deathly stillness, was extremely unique and strange.

This feeling was even more peculiar than when the two types of energy, light and darkness, were intertwined together.

Wang Xian didn’t move the ball immediately.

This ball contained a strange energy. The last time he devoured the Divine Dragon with ten attributes, Wang Xian had to deal with it carefully.

In addition, he was prepared to completely explore this area!

After sizing up the sphere for a while, Wang Xian continued to explore the surroundings.

However, after exploring for a full two days, Wang Xian went through every part of this area.

Apart from the sphere in the middle, he did not find any other items.

“This is the core of the cross primordial spirit region, the core of the ten elemental gods, and the core of the entire riot region!”

Wang Xian came to the front of the ball once again. His eyes were sparkling as he looked at the ball.

What kind of existence was the core of everything?

What kind of treasure was it?

A treasure that surpassed the Heaven’s origin creation?

If he were to obtain it, would he be able to possess invincible strength.

Wang Xian had some anticipation in his heart. At the same time, he was also somewhat vigilant!

He slowly approached the ball. When he was about ten meters away from the ball, Wang Xian slowly extended his arm.

His arm turned into a huge dragon claw and grabbed towards the ball!

Buzz

When Wang Xian’s dragon claw touched the ball, the ball, which had been in a peaceful state, suddenly trembled slightly.

Following that, Wang Xian felt a terrifying suction force surging towards him.

This suction force was extremely vast.

Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly and he wanted to resist it.

However, the strength of this suction force was far beyond his imagination.

Buzz

Before Wang Xian could react, his entire body was pulled into the sphere.

Roar! Roar

Wang Xian let out a low roar and transformed into the body of a divine dragon.

However, his huge body was still useless.
